      • index

        public void index(Document... docs)
        Description copied from class: SearchServer
        Adds a Document or Documents to the search server index. SearchServer.commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Specified by:
        index in class SearchServer
        Parameters:
        docs - comma separated Documents to be indexed.

      • index

        Parameters:

                    DocumentFactory factory)
        Description copied from class: SearchServer
        Changes a document in the index, based on the modifications described by Update.
        Specified by:
        execute in class SearchServer
        Parameters:
        update - Update modification to do on an specific document in the index.
        factory - DocumentFactory factory with the document schema.

        Parameters:

      • delete

        public void delete(Document doc)
        Description copied from class: SearchServer
        Removes a Document from the search server index. SearchServer.commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Specified by:
        delete in class SearchServer
        Parameters:
        doc - Document to be indexed.

        Parameters:
